\begin{table}[{{ pos }}]
    \caption{{ brace(caption) }}\label{{ "{table:" }}{{ label }}{{ "}" }}
    \begin{spacing}{1.3}
    {% for table in subtables  %}
        \begin{subtable}[h]{\textwidth}
            \centering
            \caption{{ brace(table.caption) }}\label{{ "{table:" }}{{ table.label }}{{ "}" }}
                \begin{tabular}{{ brace(table.colalign) }}
                \toprule
               {% if table.header_row %}{{ table.header_row }}
                \midrule{% endif %}
{{ indent(table.table_body, '        ') }}
                \bottomrule
            \end{tabular}
        \end{subtable}
        \vspace{5mm}
    {% endfor %}
    \end{spacing}
\end{table}
